workouts.name: Push-Ups
workouts.description: A basic upper body strength exercise.
workouts.instructions: Start in a plank position with your arms straight. Lower your body until your chest almost touches the floor, then push back up to the starting position.

workouts.name: Squats
workouts.instructions: Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart. Lower your body as if you're sitting back into a chair, keeping your chest up and knees over your toes. Return to standing.

workouts.name: Plank
workouts.description: A core exercise that targets the abs and back.
workouts.instructions: Start in a forearm plank position, keeping your body in a straight line from head to heels. Hold the position for as long as possible.

workouts.name: Lunges
workouts.description: A lower body exercise that targets the legs and glutes.
workouts.instructions: Step forward with one leg and lower your hips until both knees are bent at about a 90-degree angle. Push back up to the starting position and repeat on the other leg.

workouts.name: Burpees
workouts.description: A full-body exercise that combines a squat, plank, and jump.
workouts.instructions: Start in a standing position. Drop into a squat, place your hands on the floor, and jump your feet back into a plank position. Perform a push-up, jump your feet back to your hands, and jump up into the air.
